channel.title: E: Error occurred while processing python3-purl (NewVersion2)
channel.description:
in whonix-gw vbox tried to update/upgrade the repos and got this:
``` user@host:~$ sudo apt update && sudo apt full-upgrade && sudo apt remove --purge && sudo apt autoclean Hit:1 tor+https://deb.debian.org/debian bullseye InRelease Hit:2 tor+https://deb.debian.org/debian bullseye-updates InRelease Hit:3 tor+https://deb.debian.org/debian-security bullseye-security InRelease Hit:4 tor+https://deb.debian.org/debian bullseye-backports InRelease Hit:5 tor+https://deb.kicksecure.com bullseye InRelease Hit:6 tor+https://deb.whonix.org bullseye InRelease Hit:7 tor+https://fasttrack.debian.net/debian bullseye-fasttrack InRelease Reading package lists... Error! E: Problem parsing dependency 21 of python3-purl:all=1.5-2 E: Error occurred while processing python3-purl (NewVersion2) E: Problem with MergeList /var/lib/apt/lists/deb.debian.org_debian_dists_bullseye_main_binary-amd64_Packages E: The package lists or status file could not be parsed or opened. user@host:~$ ```
I found this solution:
https://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=1653580
`sudo apt-get install -f`
`sudo dpkg --configure -a`
`sudo apt update && sudo apt full-upgrade`
And it worked.

item.title: E: Error occurred while processing python3-purl (NewVersion2)
item.dc:creator: TNT_BOM_BOM
item.description:
in whonix-gw vbox tried to update/upgrade the repos and got this:

user@host:~$ sudo apt update && sudo apt full-upgrade && sudo apt remove --purge && sudo apt autoclean 
Hit:1 tor+https://deb.debian.org/debian bullseye InRelease                     
Hit:2 tor+https://deb.debian.org/debian bullseye-updates InRelease             
Hit:3 tor+https://deb.debian.org/debian-security bullseye-security InRelease   
Hit:4 tor+https://deb.debian.org/debian bullseye-backports InRelease           
Hit:5 tor+https://deb.kicksecure.com bullseye InRelease                        
Hit:6 tor+https://deb.whonix.org bullseye InRelease                 
Hit:7 tor+https://fasttrack.debian.net/debian bullseye-fasttrack InRelease
Reading package lists... Error!
E: Problem parsing dependency 21 of python3-purl:all=1.5-2
E: Error occurred while processing python3-purl (NewVersion2)
E: Problem with MergeList /var/lib/apt/lists/deb.debian.org_debian_dists_bullseye_main_binary-amd64_Packages
E: The package lists or status file could not be parsed or opened.
user@host:~$

I found this solution:

ubuntuforums.org

[ubuntu] Problem parsing dependency Depends E: Error occurred while...

hello i have some problems can anyone help me....? E: Problem parsing dependency Depends E: Error occurred while processing python-glade2 (NewVersion2) E: Problem with MergeList /var/lib/dpkg/status E: The package lists or status file could...

sudo apt-get install -f

sudo dpkg --configure -a

sudo apt update && sudo apt full-upgrade

And it worked.

Read full topic
item.source: E: Error occurred while processing python3-purl (NewVersion2)
